notes: Somalia (Hargeisa) profiling exercise of  IDPs from Somaliland, IDPs from South-Central Somalia, economic migrants, host communities, and refugees and asylum-seekers with data collected between February and June 2015 (report published January 2016). The exercise included a household survey administered to a sample of 2,510 households. Data can also be explored through the [DART](http://www.dart.jips.org/visualise?dataset=hargeisa).
